column5: Our units have been remodeled over the past several years. We are constantly upgrading and decorating. We have several units so yours may not be the one in the photos. All are the same except the decorations. Our newest remodels have the bar height counter instead of dining table & chairs. Pets on case by case basis. No aggressive breeds allow per insurance. Pet fee is $35 for 1/$50 for 2 and is collected upon arrival.
column8: BUDGET RENTAL 1 BLK TO GREAT BEACH!
